code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to(String.format("mina2:tcp://localhost:%1$s?sync=false&lazySessionCreation=false", getPort())). }

@Test public void testConnectionOnStartupTest() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to(String.format("mina2:tcp://localhost:%1$s?sync=false&lazySessionCreation=false", getPort())).         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Should have thrown an exception").     } catch (Exception e) {     // expected     } }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to(String.format("mina2:tcp://localhost:%1$s?sync=false", getPort())). }

@Test public void testConnectionOnSendMessage() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to(String.format("mina2:tcp://localhost:%1$s?sync=false", getPort())).         }     }).     try {         context.start().     } catch (Exception e) {         fail("Should not have thrown an exception").     } }
